name: Crock Pot Chili
ingredients: ['1⁄4 lb salt pork, cut into 3/8 inch cubes', '4 lbs round steaks, cut into 3/4 inch cubes', '4 onions, chopped', '3 jalapenos, seeded,vained,finely chopped', '8 cloves garlic, minced', '4 tablespoons chili powder', '2 tablespoons cajun seasoning', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon cumin, freshly ground', '2 teaspoons Mexican oregano, not as sweet as mediterranian', '1⁄2 teaspoon smoked dried chipotle powder (Cayenne will do if you must.)', '4 (15 ounce) cans crushed tomatoes, with juice', '1 (12 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 (8 ounce) canortega diced chilies', '2 dried New Mexico chiles', '1 pint beer, i usually use brown ale,you can use a pint of chicken stock if you wish to avoid beer', '4 tablespoons masa harina']

name: Armenaian Kufta (Stuffed Meat Balls)
ingredients: ['2 pound ground beef', '8 large onion', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1/2 teaspoon coriander sprigs', '1 bunch parsley', '1/2 teaspoon allspice', '-- stuffing --', '2 pound sirloin', '2 pound bulgar wheat', '2 quart chicken broth', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon corriander']

name: Orzo With Artichokes and Pine Nuts
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c orzo pasta, cooked according to pkge. directions', '3 Tbsp pine nuts, lightly toasted', '1 14oz can artichoke hearts (not marinated)', '1/4 c olive oil, extra virgin', '2 Tbsp red wine vinegar', '3/4 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp black pepper', '1 Tbsp parsley flakes', '1 tsp lemon peel (or lemon juice)']

name: Tabouli Salad
ingredients: ['1 c bulgur wheat, uncooked, heaping', '1 c cold water', '1/2 c fresh lemon juice', '2/3 c olive oil, extra virgin', '1 c italian parsley chopped', '1/2 c red onion, diced finely', '2 tsp minced garlic', '1 tsp salt', '1 tsp coarse black pepper', '4 large plum tomatoes, seeded and cut in 1/2 inch slices', '1 large cucumber, peeled, seeded, cut in 1/2 inch slices']

name: Chard Rolls Stuffed with Wild Rice/Tofu
ingredients: ['1 lb extra firm tofu, drained and water pressed out', '1/4 c white wine vinegar', '1/4 c olive oil', '1/8 c water', '1 Tbsp greek oregano', '1 tsp sea salt', '1 tsp fresh cracked pepper', '1 lb organic wild rice medley, cook according to package directions', '1 lb cooked lentils', '1/4 c kalamata olives, roughly chopped (seedless of course)', '1/2 c salted pistachios, roughly chopped', '1 large carrot, finely shredded', '1/2 large oinion, finely minced', '1 large lemon, zest and juice', '1 Tbsp freshly grated ginger', '2 clove garlic, finely minced', '1 tsp cinnamon', '1 tsp cumin', '1 tsp sea salt', '1 tsp fresh cracked pepper', '2 large bunches of swiss chard or', '1 large head of cabbage or', '8 medium yellow or red bell peppers', '24 oz tomato basil sauce (commercial or your own is fine)']
